IP address to bind the port to: IP address to bind the port to
set the time limit in ms after which the: set the time limit in ms after which the device will be reported offline if no status query is received
time to wait between two midi messages (: time to wait between two midi messages (in ms)
increase if some conditions are not disp: increase if some conditions are not displayed correctly, especially if the whole status is transferred
number of devicegroups which will be gen: number of devicegroups which will be generated for use
maximum number of channels (8 to 32, in: maximum number of channels (8 to 32, in steps of 8)
maximum number of fader banks to switch: maximum number of fader banks to switch (max. 8)
createBank: if checked the faderbanks will be newly created when parameters (maxBanks or maxChannels) changes
